column1: * The judgement of Fëanor before the Valar; Melkors lies are revealed.
* Fëanor sentenced to exile for 12 years;
column2: note 10 Finwë his father goes to exile with him. They build a stronghold at Formenos and hide the Silmarils in an iron vault.

column1: * Fingolfin becomes the ruler of the Noldor in Tirion.

column2: but Melkor casts a shadow about himself and goes into hiding.
